"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/icon": {
    "created": "20220520103208807",
    "text": "<svg width=\"22pt\" height=\"22pt\" viewBox=\"0 0 128 128\" class=\"tc-image-plugin-generic-plugin tc-image-button\" fill=\"orange\"><path fill-rule=\"evenodd\" d=\"M40.397 76.446V95.34h14.12l-.001-.005a6.912 6.912 0 005.364-11.593l.046-.023a6.912 6.912 0 119.979.526l.086.055a6.914 6.914 0 004.408 10.948l-.023.092h21.32V75.568l-.15.038a6.912 6.912 0 00-11.593-5.364l-.022-.046a6.912 6.912 0 11.526-9.979l.055-.086a6.914 6.914 0 0010.948-4.408c.079.018.158.038.236.059v-15.74h-21.32l.023-.094a6.914 6.914 0 01-4.408-10.947 10.23 10.23 0 00-.086-.055 6.912 6.912 0 10-9.979-.526l-.046.023a6.912 6.912 0 01-5.364 11.593l.001.005h-14.12v12.847A6.912 6.912 0 0129.5 59.843l-.054.086a6.912 6.912 0 10-.526 9.979l.023.046a6.912 6.912 0 0111.455 6.492zM64 0l54.56 32v64L64 128 9.44 96V32L64 0z\"/></svg>",
    "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/icon",

"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/readme": {
    "created": "20220520103353035",
    "text": "<!-- short description -->",
    "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/readme",
    "modified": "20220520103359233",
    "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
    "tags": ""
},

"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/styles": {
    "created": "20220212200401023",
    "text": "\\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline html\n\nhtml {\n  --scrollbarBG: <<color page-background>>;\n  --thumbBG: <<color sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>;\n\t/*other candidate colors: foreground, sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground */\n}\n\n/* only for Twilight palette use <<color sidebar-muted-foreground>> */\n\n/* Works on Firefox */\n* {\n  scrollbar-width: thin;\n}\n/* for Chrome, Edge */\n::-webkit-scrollbar,\n  scrollbar-width {\n  width: 4px;\n  height:2px;\n}\n\n::-webkit-scrollbar-track {\n  background: var(--scrollbarBG);\n}\n\n/* background-color: var(--thumbBG) ;\n\tbackground: linear-gradient(to top, #00f260, #0575e6); */\n::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {\n  border-radius: 3px;\n  border: 0px solid var(--scrollbarBG);\n\tbackground: linear-gradient(45deg, #00f260, #3AC9E1);\n}",
    "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/styles",
    "caption": "Scrollbar",
    "creator": "oeyoews",
    "modified": "20220520103334655",
    "modifier": "oeyoews",
    "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet",
    "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
    "revision": "0",
    "bag": "default"
}}
}
title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar
